languages.text: "Это, вроде бы, один из домашних сервиторов Денза — их Кас притащил с собой на похороны. Может быть какой-то сбой в программе из-за неправильно проведенной сервиторизации? А может быть Денз просто дал ей указание защищать внучку, зная что вся его родня и близкие — те еще подонки. Да кто теперь разберет?"

traits.locale_text: "Это, вроде бы, один из домашних сервиторов Дэнза — их Кас притащил с собой на похороны. Может быть какой-то сбой в программе из-за неправильно проведенной сервиторизации? А может быть Денз просто дал ей указание защищать внучку, зная что вся его родня и близкие — те еще подонки. Да кто теперь разберет?"

languages.text: "I think that's one of Denz's house servitors — Kas brought them with him to the funeral. Could be a malfunction caused by some error during the servitorisation process? Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"
languages.original_text: "Это, вроде бы, один из домашних сервиторов Денза — их Кас притащил с собой на похороны. Может быть какой-то сбой в программе из-за неправильно проведенной сервиторизации? А может быть Денз просто дал ей указание защищать внучку, зная что вся его родня и близкие — те еще подонки. Да кто теперь разберет?"

Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

"I think that's one of Denz's house servitors — Kas brought them with him to the funeral. Could be a malfunction caused by some error during the servitorisation process? Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

languages.text: 「あれはデンツの家庭用サーヴィターの一機でしょう。キャスが葬儀に連れてきたのかと。サーヴィター化の過程で何らかのエラーが生じ、故障したのではないでしょうか？あるいは、デンツが、友人や家族がクズであることを知っていて、孫娘を守るために命じていたのかもしれません。今となっては、誰にもわかりませんが」
languages.original_text: "I think that's one of Denz's house servitors — Kas brought them with him to the funeral. Could be a malfunction caused by some error during the servitorisation process? Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

traits.locale_text: 「あれはデンツの家庭用サーヴィターの一機でしょう。キャスが葬儀に連れてきたのかと。サーヴィター化の過程で何らかのエラーが生じ、故障したのではないでしょうか？あるいは、デンツが、友人や家族がクズであることを知っていて、孫娘を守るために命じていたのかもしれません。今となっては、誰にもわかりませんが」

languages.text: “我猜它应该是丹兹家里的机仆，被卡斯带来参加葬礼。说不定它在改造过程中发生了什么错误，所以才导致它发生了故障？又或许，丹兹早就知道他的朋友和家人全都是人渣，所以才会在咽气之前，命令这个机仆保护他的孙女。这种事情谁能说得清楚呢？”
languages.original_text: "I think that's one of Denz's house servitors — Kas brought them with him to the funeral. Could be a malfunction caused by some error during the servitorisation process? Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

traits.locale_text: “我猜它应该是丹兹家里的奴工，被卡斯带来参加葬礼。说不定它在改造过程中发生了什么错误，所以才导致它发生了故障？又或许，丹兹早就知道他的朋友和家人全都是人渣，所以才会在咽气之前，命令这个奴工保护他的孙女。这种事情谁能说得清楚呢？”

languages.text: « Je pense qu'il s'agit de l'un des servitors de la maison de Denz. Kas les a emmenés à l'enterrement. Il s'agit peut-être d'un dysfonctionnement causé par une erreur lors du processus de servitorisation ? Ou peut-être que Denz, connaissant ses amis et sa famille, lui a donné l'ordre de protéger sa petite-fille. Qui sait... »
languages.original_text: "I think that's one of Denz's house servitors — Kas brought them with him to the funeral. Could be a malfunction caused by some error during the servitorisation process? Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

traits.locale_text: « Je pense qu'il s'agit de l'un des servitors de la maison de Denz. Kas les a emmenés à l'enterrement. Il s'agit peut-être d'un dysfonctionnement causé par une erreur lors du processus de servitorisation ? Ou peut-être que Denz, connaissant ses amis et sa famille, lui a donné l'ordre de protéger sa petite-fille. Qui sait... »

languages.text: «Creo que es uno de los servidores domésticos de Denz. Kas los trajo al funeral. ¿Será un defecto producido por un error durante la servidorización? ¿O es que Denz, sabiendo la clase de gentuza que tenía como amigos y familiares, le dio la orden de proteger a su nieta? A estas alturas, es imposible saberlo».
languages.original_text: "I think that's one of Denz's house servitors — Kas brought them with him to the funeral. Could be a malfunction caused by some error during the servitorisation process? Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

traits.locale_text: «Creo que es uno de los servidores domésticos de Denz. Kas los trajo al funeral. ¿Será un defecto producido por un error durante la servidorización? ¿O es que Denz, sabiendo la clase de gentuza que tenía como amigos y familiares, le dio la orden de proteger a su nieta? A estas alturas, es imposible saberlo».

languages.text: "Ich denke, das ist einer der Servitoren aus Denzs Haus ... Kas hat ihn mit zur Beerdigung gebracht. Vielleicht eine Fehlfunktion, die durch einen Fehler während des Servitorisierungsprozesses ausgelöst wurde? Oder Denz, der zweifellos wusste, was für ein Gesindel seine Freunde und Angehörigen sind, gab ihm den Befehl, seine Enkelin zu schützen. Wer kann das schon sagen?"
languages.original_text: "I think that's one of Denz's house servitors — Kas brought them with him to the funeral. Could be a malfunction caused by some error during the servitorisation process? Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke, das ist einer der Servitoren aus Denzs Haus ... Kas hat ihn mit zur Beerdigung gebracht. Vielleicht eine Fehlfunktion, die durch einen Fehler während des Servitorisierungsprozesses ausgelöst wurde? Oder Denz, der zweifellos wusste, was für ein Gesindel seine Freunde und Angehörigen sind, gab ihm den Befehl, seine Enkelin zu schützen. Wer kann das schon sagen?"

languages.text: "Galiba Denz'in hane hizmetörlerinden biriydi. Kas cenazeye yanında getirmiş. Hizmetörleştirilme süreci sırasında gerçekleşen bir arızadan dolayı olabilir. Belki de Denz, arkadaşlarının ve ailesinin ne denli şeref yoksunu olduğunu bildiği için torununu korumasını emretmiştir. Artık istesek de bilemeyiz."
languages.original_text: "I think that's one of Denz's house servitors — Kas brought them with him to the funeral. Could be a malfunction caused by some error during the servitorisation process? Or maybe Denz, knowing his friends and family as the scum that they are, gave it orders to protect his granddaughter. Who could say at this point?"

traits.locale_text: "Sanırım Denz'in hane servitörlerinden biriydi. Kas cenazeye yanında getirmiş. Servitörleştirilme süreci sırasında gerçekleşen bir arızadan dolayı olabilir. Belki de Denz arkadaşlarının ve ailesinin ne mal olduğunu bildiği için torununu koruma emri vermiştir. Gerçeği kim bilebilir ki?"
